sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnChanges, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import {Label} from '../app.component' @Component({ selector: 'app-document-viewer', templateUrl: './document-viewer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-viewer.component.css'] }) export class DocumentViewerComponent { @Input() words: {word:string, label:Label | null}[] = []; onWordClicked(event) {} }
